ci_support_linux_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.6.* *_cpython

about.summary:
Utilities for array and list manipulation by David Mashburn.
Notably:
  * functions to scale arrays by integer multiples (without interpolation)
  * drawing basic graphics objects on (multi-dimensional) numpy arrays:
    * line segment, triangle, circle, and sphere

Utilities for array and list manipulation by David Mashburn.
Notably:
  * functions to scale arrays by integer multiples (without interpolation)
  * drawing basic graphics objects on (multi-dimensional) numpy arrays:
    * line segment, triangle, circle, and sphere

name: np_utils
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "np_utils" %}
{% set version = "0.5.12.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 087130a33201dbc229e7abe2cfc01433c5c69de34f61b5a96d8658b550d93aa6

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - numpy >=1.0
    - future >=0.16

test:
  imports:
    - np_utils

about:
  home: https://github.com/davidmashburn/np_utils
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: |
    Utilities for array and list manipulation by David Mashburn.
    Notably:
      * functions to scale arrays by integer multiples (without interpolation)
      * drawing basic graphics objects on (multi-dimensional) numpy arrays:
        * line segment, triangle, circle, and sphere
  dev_url: https://github.com/davidmashburn/np_utils

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - aaronmussig
